## Offerings interface

This class contains all the offerings configured in RevenueCat dashboard. For more info see https://docs.revenuecat.com/docs/entitlements

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare interface Offerings 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [all](./purchases-js.offerings.all.md) | <code>readonly</code> | { \[offeringId: string\]: [Offering](./purchases-js.offering.md)<!-- -->; } | Dictionary of all [Offering](./purchases-js.offering.md) objects keyed by their identifier. |
|  [current](./purchases-js.offerings.current.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [Offering](./purchases-js.offering.md) \| null | Current offering configured in the RevenueCat dashboard. |
